structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Definitions of "operator's license" and "commercial driver's license."
law.text: As used in KRS 186.400 to 186.640, a driver's license shall mean an operator's license issued pursuant to KRS 186.412 and a commercial driver's license shall mean a license issued pursuant to KRS Chapter 281A.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 455, sec. 27, effective January 13, 1990.
